channel.title: Homes on Toan Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Toan Nguyen

item.title: Datasets
item.description:
Datasets I’ll try to release all data of my research. Please reach out to me if you’re interested in any data set from my publications.
Finger-drawn PIN Authentication (Draw-A-PIN) dataset This is the data set collected and used in the Draw-A-PIN paper. Download link: https://github.com/toanvannguyen/DrawAPIN_dataset “Kid on The Phone” dataset This is the data set collected and used in the “Kid on The Phone” paper. Download link: https://github.
